text: Micropigmentation is how tattoos can look like makeup such as eyelining and adding colors to the skin of the face, lips, and eyelids. Micropigmentation is can also make artificial eyebrows for people who lost them because of old age or disease.Micropigmentation (Permanent Make-Up), MedicineNet Micropigmentation can also hide scars and white spots in the skin such as in vitiligo. ==References== Category:Cosmetics Category:Dermatology
title: Micropigmentation
